name: SpinStar (ColinSOR)
description:
Don't panic, but you're spinning at 1000 miles per hour right now. In fact, everything is spinning at that speed because the whole Earth is spinning! Everything Spins in space, which makes it quite difficult to navigate! Good thing your ship can spin too ;)

Spin Star is a simple high score game where you visit rapidly rotating planets and satellites to gain points. Made for the 2021 Kenney Game Jam, I'm pretty proud of how it turned out.

Quick Credits:

Thanks to @KenneyNL for hosting this game jam and creating a plethora of awesome assets to use!

Thanks to the Phaser 3 Devs for building a very cool Javascript Game Engine!

Thanks to @LouieZong for the music! Check out his Bandcamp here: https://louiezong.bandcamp.com/ (Specifically the Greenhouse Album was used in this game)
